title: Vanderbilt Mansion National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Bard Rock Road Closed to Vehicles  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Bard Rock Road Closed to Vehicles  The road to Bard Rock will be closed to vehicles through August 18th for paving.  We apologize for any inconvenience.  The road will still be accessible for walkers.  Any updates will be posted here or on our Facebook page.
